prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon with pink coral-like features and a cheerful smile.
Generate a cute, small Pokemon resembling a coral reef, with vibrant colors and a friendly expression.
Imagine a Pokemon inspired by underwater life, featuring bright pink colors and a bubbly personality.
Show me a unique Pokemon that looks like a piece of coral, with distinct shapes and friendly characteristics.
Design a whimsical ocean-themed Pokemon with soft curves and a bright, happy demeanor.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that combines sea life elements with charming pink hues and a joyful nature.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a colorful coral, displaying vibrant colors and a friendly appearance.
